attributes.action: Make High Definition Television Channels Available Via Free To View Digital Terrestrial Television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At, or before, digital switchover the government should give an undertaking to allocate sufficient spectrum to ,at the least the main publice service broadcasters, to allow them to provide free to air high definition television via the digital terrestrial television service.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make High Definition Television Channels Available Via Free To View Digital Terrestrial Television."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14375.asp

Prime Minister's Office
